updater.UPDATE: *Oh, you're already rocking the latest version, my friend!*
updater.NEW_UPDATE:
*Hold on to your hats! There's a fresh update for the bot!*

*Changes:*

global.dotbody: Hey Captain, I'm always ready for action.
global.promote: Admin Role Given. Now that's some authority!
global.pmallow:
*Hey there, I'm Peter Griffin.*
*Crafted with love by Your Mom.*
My master's currently occupied.
Drop your message, and I'll make sure he gets the memo.

I'm on it, Captain...
global.pmblock:
❌ *Blocked*

 You've been banned for spamming.

 By Peter Griffin...
global.pmwarn:
✋Hey* 
Ease up on the spam or I'll unleash the ban hammer. _You've got ${checkPermit.times} warning(s)._

 * Brought to you by Gideon*
global.permited:
Hey ${tname} Sir*

You've got the green light to PM now.

 *Peter Griffin...*
global.revoked:
*Hey ${tname} Sir*

Your PM privileges have been revoked.

 *Peter Griffin...
global.demote: Admin Role Taken back. Back to the shadows!
global.session:
*This is your ddev session guard it like a treasure.*
_Now, insert that code in your SESSION_ID variable in repo_
 Connect your repo to Heroku and *Deploy Branch*, and the bot will be your eternal companion.

*© ᴘᴏᴡᴇʀᴇᴅ ʙʏ ᴅᴅᴇᴠ ʙᴏᴛ*
global.title: DDEV BOT
global.chat_desc:
Options available: 1. mute
2. unmute
3. archive
4. unarchive
5. read
6. unread
7. delete
global.couple_male: *I don't want to face life alone; a female companion would be nice, ya know?*
global.couple_female: *I don't want to navigate life solo; a male partner sounds perfect, ya know?*
global.admin: ⚠️ *This command is strictly for group admins!*
global.owner: ⚠️ *This command is exclusively for My Owner.*
global.group: ❗ *This feature is only for group chats!*
global.private: ⚠️ *This feature is in use exclusively for My Owner.*
global.bot: ⚠️ *This feature is currently reserved for the bot number.*
